Fraksi PSI DPRD DKI Minta Anies Baswedan Batalkan Formula E 2020
07 Nov 2019, 09:04 by Adam Prireza, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Partai Solidaritas Indonesia meminta Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan membatalkan rencana penyelenggaraan Formula E tahun 2020. Menurut anggota Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Daerah dari fraksi PSI, Anthony Winza Probowi, hal tersebut merupakan bentuk pemborosan uang rakyat di tengah kondisi Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Daerah DKI yang mengalami defisit.
Anthony menggambarkan kondisi masyarakat Ibu Kota yang masih memerlukan perhatian lebih. Ia bahkan menyebut acara yang diproyeksikan menelan biaya triliunan rupiah itu tak berkaitan dengan perencanaan strategis daerah di Jakarta.
“Kalau mau gaya-gayaan dan mencari panggung, jangan pakai uang rakyat. Apalagi tidak jelas berapa proyeksi pendapatan yang kita terima,” kata Anthony pada Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Senada dengan Anthony, anggota DPRD fraksi PSI lainnya, Anggara Wicitra Sastroamidjojo mengatakan gelaran Formula E 2020 tak berkaitan dengan upaya mendorong penggunaan mobil listrik. Menurut dia, banyak cara lain yang bisa dilakukan untuk mendukung program mobil listrik yang belakangan sedang gencar dipromosikan Pemprov DKI.
Salah satu opsinya, menurut dia, adalah dengan pembangunan infrastruktur pendukung penggunaan mobil listrik.
“Misalnya, Pemprov bikin charger mobil listrik di ribuan tempat. Beli juga ratusan bus listrik,” kata Anggara.
Pria yang akrab dipanggil Ara itu juga mengatakan dirinya belum mendapat kajin investasi terkait penyelenggaraan Formula E 2020. Ia juga mempermasalahkan acara tersebut yang belum masuk ke dalam Rencana Pembangunan Jangka Menengah Daerah (RPJMD) DKI Jakarta, namun masuk menjadi program prioritas gubernur.
Sebelumnya, Anies mengatakan Ibu Kota akan menjadi tuan rumah balap mobil listrik Formula E tahun depan. Tak hanya itu, kata Anies, Jakarta akan menjadi tuan rumah untuk lima musim balap mendatang.
Anies menyebut balap mobil listrik tersebut akan digelar di Jakarta pada 6 Juni 2020. Balapan itu kata Anies, akan digelar di seputar kawasan Monumen Nasional (Monas). Balapan Formula E ini rencananya akan menelan anggaran sebesar Rp 1,6 triliun.

PSI DKI DPRD Faction Asks Anies Baswedan to Cancel Formula E 2020
Nov 7 2019, 09:04 by Adam Prireza, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Indonesian Solidarity Party has asked DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan to cancel the plan to implement Formula E in 2020. According to a member of the Regional House of Representatives from the PSI faction, Anthony Winza Probowi, this is a form of waste of public money amidst the conditions of the Revenue Budget and DKI Regional Expenditure that has a deficit.
Anthony described the condition of the Capital City people who still needed more attention. He even said that the event which was projected to cost trillions of rupiah was not related to regional strategic planning in Jakarta.
"If you want to style and look for the stage, don't use public money. Moreover, it is unclear how much income projections we receive, "Anthony said on Thursday, November 7, 2019.
In line with Anthony, another DPRD member of the PSI faction, Anggara Wicitra Sastroamidjojo said the Formula E 2020 event was not related to efforts to encourage the use of electric cars. According to him, there are many other ways that can be done to support the electric car program which is currently being actively promoted by the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government.
One option, according to him, is the development of infrastructure to support the use of electric cars.
"For example, the Provincial Government makes electric car chargers in thousands of places. Buy hundreds of electric buses too, "said Anggara.
The man who is familiarly called Ara also said he had not received investment allowance related to the implementation of Formula E 2020. He also questioned the event which had not been included in the DKI Jakarta Regional Medium-Term Development Plan (RPJMD), but instead became a priority program for the governor.
Previously, Anies said the capital would host Formula E electric car racing next year. Not only that, said Anies, Jakarta will be the host for the next five racing seasons.
Anies said the electric car race will be held in Jakarta on June 6, 2020. The race said Anies, will be held around the National Monument (Monas) area. The Formula E race is planned to cost a budget of Rp 1.6 trillion.
